Description: Fragment from base and bottom part of black figure (?) pottery amphora; echinus shaped ring foot. Outside covered in slip fired black/red; surface worn; red stripe at lower edge on outside of foot. Red dipinto underneath the base; outline incised by Petrie (poorly rendered). Orange clay, Munsell 2.5YR 6/6 and 2.5YR 5/6 (light red-red).
Curator's comments: Poorly incised outline of dipinto marked by Petrie as 'INCIS 1886'
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (pl. xxxii, right, 2nd from bottom)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 358)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.129)
